summary: Provides utilities to translate Anthropic chat request and response structures into the format required by Vertex AI partner models and viceâ€‘versa, handling configuration, error mapping, tool usage, streaming responses, and usage statistics.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of Anthropic models through Vertex AI within the litellm framework by abstracting the data transformation layer, enabling developers to call Anthropic models via Vertex AI without dealing with format incompatibilities.
